unit, will be leaving, CEO Steve Ballmer said in an e-mail to employees Wednesday. Startup Virtual Iron has a maturing virtual server technology that is making inroads with customers and providing a challenge to VMWare. Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools. 2 days of protests in Egypt Zahi Hawass said now that the Egyptian Museum's collection is secure from thieves, the greatest threat to the collection inside is posed by the torched ruling party headquarters building next door. What scares me is that if this building is destroyed, it will fall over the museum, Zahi Hawass said as he watched fire trucks spray water on the still smoldering NDP headquarters.
